Name: Dashing Orange
About the game: Dashing Orange is a fast-paced 2D platformer with a focus on precision and fluidity, where you´re in control of a cute little Orange in a journey in this abstract world. Along the way, you’ll master jump, wall-jumping, wall-sliding, dashing and more than 25 new mechanics and traps as you leap from level to level, moving along, up and down the screen to put in your best possible performance in 75 challenging stages. Key Features 75 hand-crafted levels to test your skills Tight controls - Jump over spikes, dash and climb walls, optimized controls for gamepads and keyboards Paint levels with your orange juice by jumping, dashing or, well, dying New mechanics being introduced every 3 levels Start over immediately after a failed attempt
